name: Need for wheel
description:
Play the cat Big Juicy as you speed down the streets of Beverly Hills.

Avoid the obstacles on the road and in the sky to arrive at your final destination and see who can manage to get the highest score.

Controls Keyboard: "A" & "D" - Steer Left and Right
"Spacebar" - Drift/Brake
"W" & "S" -  Fly up/down (in Flight mode)
"Escape" - Pause/Pause menu
Controls Xbox controller"Left stick" - Steer Left and Right
"A-button" - Drift/Brake
"Right stick" - Fly up/down (in Flight mode)
"Start" - Pause/Pause menuControls Android"Tilt" - Steer Left and Right
"Press on screen" - Drift/Brake (in Ground mode)
"Press on Screen" - Fly up (in Flight mode)
"Pause button" - Pause/Pause menu
